definition: to use (sth) on its own
surname Shan
bill/list/form/single/only/sole/odd number/CL:個|个[ge4]
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: It has more discussion on the reason which it can be used singly from this article.
sentences.chinese: 文章还进一步探讨了“不一定”可以单用的原因。

sentences.english: Only Huoquan treat spinal pain and heel pain.
sentences.chinese: 单用火全治脊椎痛及足跟痛。

sentences.english: The technology of pre-decorrelation and linear single-user detection anti-MAI were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 研究了预去相关及线性单用户检测抗多址干扰技术。

sentences.english: Use of limb lead or single lead thoracic placement electrocardiograms resulted in some loss of specificity.
sentences.chinese: 用肢导联或单用胸导联的心电图可致特异性更低。

sentences.english: The 366 cases in the second group received standard hepatitis B vaccine injection alone.
sentences.chinese: 单用组366例，为单用标准乙肝疫苗注射。

sentences.english: The 366 cases in the second group received standard hepatitis B vaccine injection alone.
sentences.chinese: 单用组366例，为单用标准乙肝疫苗注射。

sentences.english: " Stewardesses " is the longest word typed with only the left hand.
sentences.chinese: “女空服员”这个字是单用左手打字最长的一个单字。

sentences.english: The thesis studies the capacity of MIMO systems for single user.
sentences.chinese: 针对单用户MIMO系统信道的容量特性展开研究。

sentences.english: Simply remove that file and try a single user mode boot again.
sentences.chinese: 删除该文件，并再次尝试单用户模式引导即可。

sentences.english: The non-hemoperfusion group was treated with pralidoxime alone.
sentences.chinese: 非灌流组在综合治疗基础上单用解磷定。

sentences.english: Quetiapine monotherapy was continued for an additional 40 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 之后，单用奎硫平再持续继续治疗40周。

sentences.english: When echinacea was used alone it reduced cold incidence by 65%.
sentences.chinese: 单用紫锥花能使患感冒的可能性降低65%。

sentences.english: In the middle stage, Dinggui and Furong powders were scattered on the plasters respectively.
sentences.chinese: 后期单用丁桂散或芙蓉粉直接撒在棉花上外敷。

sentences.english: While, the effect of BR on maize growth was not marked.
sentences.chinese: 而单用大垄沟种植对玉米的生长无明显的增进作用。

sentences.english: Hypertension, as monotherapy or with other antihypertensives.
sentences.chinese: 高血压，抗高血压药物单用或与其他。

definition: to share/to use in common/suitable/fit for purpose/useable
external
to show an effect/to produce an effect/a conspicuous effect
to use (two words etc) together/to use (sth) continuously
intolerance (for lactose, gluten or other foods)
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
to blend two or more medicines/compatibility (of herbal remedies, medicines)
to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
medicine made from a single herb/drug made from a single substance
quantity used/usage/consumption/dose
dexamethasone
to tolerate/endurance
corticosteroid
compound prescription (involving several medicines)
to apply externally
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
